title: C (2nd sem)
content:
Confused as to what depth to go in certain topics that are gonna come in next semesters like linked lists, stack, queues and a few more it would be helpful if seniors could give some inputs .

The slides are mostly useless and ive been doing most just from reference books .Some topics just seem so long and overwhelming atp that i dont think i could ever be fully confident in that particular topic.

tbh idt i can ever be fully confident in C itself :(

comments.body: Refer to the notes on pesuacademy the concepts are given in more detail

Do pesuacademy note 
And for esa they just give pyq questions
Do C PESUNotes, seems big but it rly isn't, for ESA do last 5 yrs qp, you'll get 100/100. I remember by C ESA was done in 1 hour flat, all the qs were recycled
how to access these esa pyqs? can you please help, there is some pesu online library for that right??
